item.title: ET
item.description: score:10 Chances: Energy Transfer LP has been one of the stocks most watched by Zacks.com users lately, indicating high market interest. Energy Transfer is ready to make another acquisition if the right opportunity arises, showcasing a proactive and growth-oriented approach. Energy Transfer LP shares have started gaining and might continue moving higher in the near term, as indicated by solid earnings estimate revisions.

item.title: CNM
item.description: score:-11 Chances: Core & Main, Inc. has seen substantial growth in its share price, with over a 100% increase this year. The company has announced multiple acquisitions and agreements to expand its product offerings and market reach. Institutions have substantial holdings in Core & Main, indicating significant influence over the company’s direction and performance.
